Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: G. T. Olson "GTO"
Reviews.Content: I didn't know too much about cameras when I ordered this.  What I wanted was an unobtrusive camera with wide capture angle to replace a bulky and ugly camera that came with a package set.  Installation was a snap and  the microphone is nice b/c it does a nice job capturing conversations near the front door.  Video quality is great and it's lasted 9 months so far without any problems.  I'll plan to buy more of these as the need arises.

ProductInfo.Features:
High-resolution camera produces images of 700 horizontal lines
Built-in 1/3'' SONY Effio CCD, Color DSP, Automatic CDS sensor
28 IR illuminators for night vision, f3.6mm wide angle lens
Weatherproof Vandal proof housing and sunshield for indoor and outdoor
Package included: 1 sony effio CCD camera, 1 Pre-Amp mini hidden microphone, 1 pack video audio power cable, 1 power supply and 1 free security warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Built-in 1/3'' SONY Effio CCD Day Night Vision Outdoor IR CCTV Security Camera 700TVL 28 Infrared LEDs Wide Angle High Resolution Vandal Proof Weatherproof with Pre-Amp Mini Hidden Microphone, Extension Cable and Power Supply 1ZG
